entry.value: Select id as id_respuesta, item as id_pregunta, completed as id_encuesta, valor from flowfile where id >= 7

outputPorts.name: Salida_Temporales
outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'Salida_Temporales'' is invalid because Port has no outgoing connections

entry.value: SELECT Respuestas.id_encuesta,Respuestas.valor as departamento FROM Respuestas INNER JOIN Preguntas ON Respuestas.id_pregunta=Preguntas.id_pregunta WHERE Preguntas.descripcion LIKE 'DEPARTAMENT%';
SELECT Respuestas.id_encuesta,Respuestas.valor as familia FROM Preguntas INNER JOIN Respuestas ON Respuestas.id_pregunta=Preguntas.id_pregunta WHERE Preguntas.descripcion LIKE 'FAMILIA%'
SELECT Respuestas.id_encuesta,Respuestas.valor as curso FROM Preguntas INNER JOIN Respuestas ON Respuestas.id_pregunta=Preguntas.id_pregunta WHERE Preguntas.descripcion LIKE '%Estudias Grado%'
Select id as id_tipo, name as descripcion from flowfile where id >= 7

entry.value: Select id as id_pregunta, feedback as id_tipo, name as descripcion from flowfile where feedback >= 7

entry.value: select id as id_encuesta, feedback as id_tipo, TIMESTAMPADD(SECOND, timemodified,cast('1970-01-01 00:00:00' as timestamp)) completada from flowfile

entry.key: Log level when file not found

entry.value: SELECT Id_Actividad, Actividad AS Descripcion, CASE WHEN CAST(SUBSTRING(Fecha_Fin FROM 4 FOR 2) AS INTEGER) IN (1, 2, 3) THEN 1 WHEN CAST(SUBSTRING(Fecha_Fin FROM 4 FOR 2) AS INTEGER) IN (4, 5, 6) THEN 2 WHEN CAST(SUBSTRING(Fecha_Fin FROM 4 FOR 2) AS INTEGER) IN (7, 8, 9) THEN 3 WHEN CAST(SUBSTRING(Fecha_Fin FROM 4 FOR 2) AS INTEGER) IN (10, 11, 12) THEN 4 END AS Trimestre, Fecha_Ini, Fecha_Fin, Peso FROM FLOWFILE

SELECT Id_Usuario AS ID_Alumno, UPPER(Nombre) AS Nombre, UPPER(CASE WHEN POSITION(' ' IN Apellidos) > 0 THEN TRIM(SUBSTRING(Apellidos, 1, POSITION(' ' IN Apellidos) - 1)) ELSE Apellidos END) AS Apellido1, UPPER(CASE WHEN POSITION(' ' IN Apellidos) > 0 THEN TRIM(SUBSTRING(Apellidos, POSITION(' ' IN Apellidos) + 1)) ELSE '' END) AS Apellido2, Grupo, Email FROM FLOWFILE

entry.value: SELECT 'Act_01' AS ID_Actividad, Id_Usuario AS ID_Alumno, COALESCE(Act_01, 0) AS Nota FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_02', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_02, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_03', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_03, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_04', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_04, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_05', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_05, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_06', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_06, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_07', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_07, 0) FROM FLOWFILE UNION ALL SELECT 'Act_08', Id_Usuario, COALESCE(Act_08, 0) FROM FLOWFILE
